name: Ta Nang - Phan Dung, the most fantastic trekking trail in Vietnam
description: For anyone who love nature and like to trekking through more terrains. Ta Nang - Phan Dung is a 55 kms trekking trail from Lam Dong (a highland of Vietnam), through continous grass hill, cold stream, and dipterocarp forest to Binh Thuan province.
